text: borsa del hsai na ke min trauv rieb apa pipea cheamuoy sdrei na krawpi sdrei hsai na dauchaknea ryy sdrei mou sh ri ki n noh laey . haey sdrei hsai na ku kmean borsa na rieb apa pipea cheamuoy neang krawpi borsa hsai na ryy borsa mou sh ri ki n noh laey . haey kar rieb a pea pi- pea noh trauv ban ke hamkhat towleu banda anak del mean chomnue
